:: Reptilica and Bloodystyke ::

:: The two bots fly towards the exit of the Iron Fist, excited, for 
they were about to train. They reach the exit and zoom out of the 
opening, flying at an incredible speed.  The two fly for a few 
minutes, speech kept to a minimum when something catches 
Bloodystyke's attention.  A very large area of land was burnt and 
destroyed, yet there was no sign of anything that could of caused 
it.  The two bots were stumped, that is, until they decended onto the 
patch of land, only to be shocked by an energon field as strong as 
any of the two bots had ever felt.  They immediatly switched to beast 
mode, knowing that the energon wouldn't effect them as much. The two 
roamed around the large area, searching for any clue as to what could 
of caused the mass destruction.  Finnaly, the two were ready to give 
up, tired of searching for what seemed to be an invisible object.  
They planned to report the incident to Zardus, and hopefully, that 
would be the end of it.  Their hopes were crushed when they stumbled 
over a large bot with a menacing face, a bot who intimidated both of 
the warriors, for he was a force to be reckoned with.  That is, when 
he was actually awake, for, the mighty warrior was in stasis lock.  
The two brothers looked at each other, shocked as they realised that 
it was their old leader, the mighty Wolfgang.  The two hoisted the 
very large bot onto their backs and quickly transformed into bot 
mode.  They flew towards the Iron Fist, and were to arrive shortly ::
